resources.string: Access to the camera is needed to scan QR codes
The QR code scanner cannot run because this app does not have the camera permission. The camera will now close.
QR Code Scanner cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
You must unlock your device to access this app
Are you sure you want to exit the app? Your progress will be lost
Tap to capture. Pinch to zoom
There was an error starting the camera
How would you like to restore your wallet?
Make sure you\'re in a safe environment, and no one looking over your shoulder
Select your Keystore File and Enter your Password

Remember to keep your password and keystore safe. You will need both your password and the keystore file in order to unlock your wallet or recover it in the future. You are solely responsible for managing your credentials. We do not backup your credentials for you!

Remember to keep your password and phrase safe. You will need your password and the 12-word phrase in order to unlock your wallet or recover it in the future. You are solely responsible for managing your credentials. We do not backup your credentials for you! By pressing \"Generate Phrase\", you will be taken to the next screen with your 12-word phrase. Keep it safe and make sure no one is looking over your shoulder.

Remember to keep your password and phrase safe. You will need your password and the 12-word phrase in order to unlock your wallet or recover it in the future. You are solely responsible for managing your credentials. We do not backup your credentials for you! Keep your information safe and make sure no one is looking over your shoulder.

By pressing \"confirm\", you acknowledge that you read and understood the disclaimer and will keep your credentials safe. Treat them with care, because they may be responsible for guarding your riches one day.

This 12-word phrase is used to recover and unlock your wallet. It must be used with the password you provided earlier. By pressing \"Confirm Phrase\" you will be taken to the next screen to reenter these 12 words.

To enter a word type a word in the box below and press \"Add\". You will be able to submit them after entering all 12 words.\n\nTo reorder a word, hold the reorder icon on the right and drag it. To delete a word, swipe it to the right.
You must enter a wallet name
You must enter a contact name
The wallet must start with a letter or number and can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, dashes, (-), and underscores (_)
The name must start with a letter or number and can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, dashes, (-), and underscores (_)
The wallet name should be at least 3 characters long
The wallet name cannot be longer than 255 characters
The contact name cannot be longer than 255 characters
Your password must be at least 9 characters long
The keystore file to unlock your wallet named %s
An unknown error occurred retrieving your file
To select your keystore file, install a File Manager
Enter a valid word with no spaces and only letters
The file selected or password is invalid
File permissions are needed to save your wallet information
There was an error creating your credentials
There was an unknown error creating your wallet
You must enter a valid private key
You must enter a valid address
The address must start with \"0x\" and can only contain numbers and the letters A-F
The address must be 42 characters long
A wallet with this name or private key already exists in this app
The selected keystore file is not supported
Your private key must be 64 characters long
Your private key must only contain the letters A–F and numbers 0–9
File permissions are needed to save your keystore file. Don\'t worry, we take the best measures to keep your information secure. To learn more, read our Security FAQ.
You may now finish restoring your wallet
One or more of the words is incorrect
You have no contacts. Contacts allow you to quickly identify people without having to reenter their address.
A network error occurred. Please try again and report the error
An unknown error occurred. Please try again or submit a bug report
You have no tokens to send
You may only send tokens that do not have a 0 balance
There was an error getting your ETH balance
There was an error getting your token\'s balance
You need more ETH to send this transaction, or you can try lowering your gas settings
You cannot send more tokens than you currently have
Manage the lock screen when opening this app or viewing your private key
Manage the gas price and gas limit for sending Ether and Tokens
Manage LRC fees and margin splitting for submitting orders
Connect to different relays or use different smart contract versions
Connect to a other Ethereum nodes or add a custom one
Change your native currency and its refresh frequency
Hide low balance tokens and customize other in-app experiences
This setting is disabled unless you turn on an application lock
The 2 entered PINs do not match
Enter your PIN to enter the app
Enter your old PIN to create a new one
Enter your old PIN to disable security settings
Enter your PIN to view your private key
You are locked out for %s more minutes
You are locked out for %s more seconds
Gas price is how much you\'re willing to pay per unit of gas. Increasing this value will make your transactions run faster.
Gas limit is the max quantity of gas you\'re willing to spend on a transaction. Don\'t change these values unless you know what you\'re doing.
The LRC trade fee is the fee paid to fulfill an order. Setting a higher LRC fee will help fulfill your orders faster but may have marginal benefits beyond a certain point.

Margin splitting is the percentage paid if a better deal is found than in your order. Margin splitting will never result in you getting less than what you specified in the order. For more information on margin splitting, check the FAQ.
This setting is disabled if you have USD selected
A relay is a market that provides liquidity. There are many benefits to connecting to different relays. For more information on relays and their differences, see the FAQ.
The smart contract version you select is meant to provide a set of standards and features for trading. You should rarely (if ever) have to retrace back to old versions.
An Ethereum Node is your entry-point for accessing the Ethereum network.
You cannot send more ETH than your balance minus gas
An application lock protects the assets on your device by adding a lock screen before opening this app, or when you want to view your private key.
You are about to send %s tokens, which is worth about %s. Are you sure you want to send these tokens to %s?
A barcode that can be scanned
There was an error creating the QR code

We do not recommend exporting your keystore, because other apps will be able to see it. It\'s safest to keep the keystore in this app. For this reason, we recommend using a 12-word phrase for securing your wallet.
